B2 the act or process of examining a crime, problem, statement, etc. carefully, especially to discover the truth: An investigation has been under way for several days into the disappearance of a 13-year-old boy. a full/thorough investigation of the incident Currently, the individuals who might have caused the accident are subject to/under investigation.
More examplesFewer examplesThe bank conducted its own internal investigation into the robbery.A lengthy police investigation failed to produce any evidence on which the suspect could be convicted.There will be a full investigation to work out what caused the accident.Both companies are under investigation for corrupt practices.They decided to reopen the investigation when some new evidence emerged.
